QuestData.Title: WANTED: Junkbrat and Roadtrogg
QuestData.Description:
Responsible for a spree of mayhem and chaos throughout the Heaps, resulting in the theft of energy cells, spare parts, and the consumption of Improbable Mechano-Chicken Wings without payment.
Special caution around Roadtrogg, who has demonstrated a violent attitude towards living things.
Elimination of these two felons is of the highest priority.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Capable of mayhem anywhere at anytime.
